name: Up The Crag
description:
Up the Crag is a simple 3d fps game, where you are compelled to climb a mountain you don't really want to.

Try and discover all the deaths! There are twenty deaths in total.

~~~

 - Everything Made by Uthel -

3d Models made/rigged in Blender

Audio made in Audacity/Traction Waveform

Music made in Traction Waveform

Sprites/Textures made in GIMP

Everything else made in Unity

This is my first completed and released game, I hope you enjoy!

Join the Uthel Games discord, where I post regular devlogs and updates - you can also get early builds of my projects, and be involved in the development and testing!

https://discord.gg/BGrAqekzfE
